title: Widdop37
author: Widdop37
content: Do you think that Metaverse will actually work out in the future? I am one of the very few that believes that Metaverse won't be successful because what the world cares about the most is the most needy, I asked myself if metaverse is really needy and I can't seem to find an answer, what about you?/

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Did you think a lot people are more easier to migrated into "Metaverse" ?Remember, you need a tools to use that and not easy to make a lot people coming into #Metaverse. Some people will say "But, a crypto user will gonna to support that" let be honest about that.If you don't get any profitable on #Metaverse, you're not gonna to do it. People in crypto more like it 90% gonna to do it just because profit, take example from NFTs space a few month ago.

comments.author: TribalBob
comments.body: I think the metaverse has space and place in the future, but we don't know for sure when or just like NFT which only has a short fomo, because as we know it's not easy to migrate, it takes a lot to go through all of that process.

comments.author: CryptoATM
comments.body: Altcoins are all cruise, make your money and switch to another either for long term ot short term, those who made fortune out of terra luna before the crash did so well but some got greedy, they prefer staring at their gains in their wallet until all hell came crashing down.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: Widdop37 on August 05, 2022, 12:46:50 PMDo you think that Metaverse will actually work out in the future? I am one of the very few that believes that Metaverse won't be successful because what the world cares about the most is the most needy, I asked myself if metaverse is really needy and I can't seem to find an answer, what about you?/I think that with the metaverse it will probably be the same as with any crypto trends or in general with trends and hypes. First a new project appears that is doing something new and people and also institutions find this idea really interesting and therefore the valuation of this projects is rising like crazy. This of course is the reason why a lot of other people also want to come out with a project of the same type in order to hop on the hype train and also earn a lot of money. This happens until the market is over saturated and then 95% of those new projects are dying again.That being said, i believe that the metaverse has a future. Maybe it will not be THE BIGGEST trend of the next decade but it will still be relevant i think.

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: Metaverse still not working in the world very well but it will probably work in the future and metaverse will be a better technology in the world. in that time metaverse project will gain a better position on the marketcap

comments.author: hyudien
comments.body: Crypto users do not need to take part in the Metaverse world if it is not possible, just invest in Metaverse-based coins. Accessing the Metaverse world as many people say requires tools, not everyone has them. In the future, there's no telling if the Metaverse really has a good place or if it will be abandoned as other games are much easier to reach if it's P2E only.

comments.author: inanilujimi
comments.body: It seems that in the future all the needs that we currently enjoy will no longer be needed for people in the future, so I also interpret that metavers are not really needed for us at this time, but as time develops and technology will increasingly change the mindset of humans .

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: Quote from: Widdop37 on August 05, 2022, 12:46:50 PM~I am kind of seeing these VR stuffs in Facebook lately and one even included a virtual meeting of the whole board of the company. It is quite...okay, but Metaverse only in its definition might nobe sufficient enough to be used just yet in this modern civilization.If it does not work out, it might end up like those deprecated stuffs like Oculus Rift that I even recall back in 2015s when I was watching Youtube vids.It is cool, but it needs further innovation.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Of course, metaverse will be a thing in the years to come, you can already tell with the number of big names of sports and none sports industry entering the metaverse space, some people will say they are in for marketing and nothing more but these brands will not spend so much to join a trend that is temporary. No doubt there will be many fake metaverse projects but there will also be a few good ones from trusted brands that will make a difference in the metaverse space.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: It can definitely work, because people love virtual reality and to escape from reality. There are many individuals who aren't satisfied with aspects of their currently life, so they enter virtual environments where they have total control over their appearance, where they can be powerful, rich, influent and even put in practice behaviors they wouldn't practice in real life.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Metaverse as a concept that needs to be centralized to implement and therefore requires huge investments. If a company has enough resources to manage it, it may achieve success just as Meta (Facebook) doesBut in cryptocurrencies, it is a way to get free promotion, after I  NFTs wave down, and more and more people are turning away from such investments.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Metaverse is a really interesting concept in which cryptocurrencies can find their worthy application beyond mere speculation. I don't know how long it will take before this concept gets a large-scale adoption, but investments in this sphere already amount to large sums. Metaverse, Web3, etc., will all get their due development, I believe. Virtual reality has always attracted a lot of attention.

Well, time can tell.

comments.body: Innovation will always have a place in this world, have you seen many good projects about metaverse? You’ll see there how the technology will grow more if we are able to utilize and maximize its potential, so I believe they can be big here and with cryptomarket, I’m sure they will also survive. Metaverse is great, for sure they can have their best time here and many crypto followers will surely adopt it.

comments.author: Iranus
comments.body: Quote from: Widdop37 on August 05, 2022, 12:46:50 PMDo you think that Metaverse will actually work out in the future? I am one of the very few that believes that Metaverse won't be successful because what the world cares about the most is the most needy, I asked myself if metaverse is really needy and I can't seem to find an answer, what about you?/Metaverse is also a trend in the market, it is difficult to say if it can explode in the future or not. Nowadays, like NFT, the metaverse market is of great interest to many tech companies and they tend to join the growing metaverse field, so I think there is a future for the metaverse. It can be seen that Facebook is betting big on the metaverse, so it could become the focus in the coming years.
